column1: Happy #Thanksgiving! I'm grateful to God for our freedoms and for so many great supporters of my campaign.  Thank you and I pray you and your families have a gratitude-filled day. https://t.co/zeNawZArig
Thank you to all who have served our nation in the Armed Forces.  Happy Veterans Day from a grateful nation! #VeteransDay #ncpol https://t.co/hfSXv6W4Ry
Congrats @ThomTillis on your hard fought victory! #ncsen

Working the polls in Burke County this morning! Polls close at 7:30pm.   If you still need to vote go to https://t.co/0ovUf2kwEt for all the information you will need to go and cast your vote today! #TeamFoxx #ncpol https://t.co/OFyIOaLW2v

It was an honor to welcome you to the High Country this morning @Mike_Pence ! I was pleased to worship with the VP and the congregation of Alliance Bible Fellowship and a special thanks to Pastor Andrews for a wonderful sermon! https://t.co/6CzRcADOPn

I am pleased to have received a "Conservative" grade on @FRCAction Voter Guide! You can see the rating for everyone on your ballot by texting your zip code to 53445. #TeamFoxx #ncpol https://t.co/txAIl4lEt0

Today is the last day to request an absentee-ballot! If you are planning on voting absentee you have until 5:00 PM to request your ballot. Click this link and follow the instructions to request your ballot --> https://t.co/PWjmdpIMyg'

My approach to serving in Congress is straight-forward: fight for common-sense solutions that solve the problems my constituents face.  Here's a summary of my record on some of the issues many conservatives are concerned about. I hope I can count on your vote. #TeamFoxx #ncpol https://t.co/XCqSRf3Mjf

My friend Congresswoman @DebbieLesko is a tough courageous woman who escaped domestic violence. The fact the media is attacking her because of the trauma caused by her abuser decades ago is utterly disgraceful and should NEVER happen.
Looking forward to welcoming @POTUS @realDonaldTrump to Gastonia this evening! #TeamFoxx #ncpol  https://t.co/pGYJ0XIU8Q

I have been working the early voting locations across the 5th district and have been encouraged by the turnout and enthusiasm so far! Early voting is happening now through October 31st. You can find your early voting locations here: https://t.co/CLFJaKFbP6 #TeamFoxx #ncpol https://t.co/t9U9vdn8Ge

Today is the first day of early voting in North Carolina! I voted this morning in Foscoe. When do you plan on voting early?   Early voting runs through October 31st. Click this link to find your early voting location https://t.co/CLFJaKFbP6 #TeamFoxx #ncpol https://t.co/XYZXZphR6K

Today marks 3 weeks until #ElectionDay. Early voting starts this Thursday October 15.   Do you have a plan to vote? Follow the link below to make your plan and ensure your vote is counted! #TeamFoxx #ncpol   https://t.co/ehSVNps67S
Grateful for the endorsement of the @NRA. I will always fight for our 2nd Amendment rights! #TeamFoxx #ncpol  https://t.co/dVfXSdphST https://t.co/kDpDwVIkb0

Tonight is the first presidential debate! I'm looking forward to hearing President Trump lay out his bold vision for a brighter American future and calling out the Democrats for their out-of-touch policies #TeamFoxx https://t.co/rBM4Vecj3E
Grateful to receive the endorsement of the @USChamber! #TeamFoxx #ncpol https://t.co/V27fCUrtH3
We must never forget September 11 2001. Today we remember those we have lost and recommit ourselves to fighting for liberty and justice for all. https://t.co/P9K1t8aQnK

What great enthusiasm for @realDonaldTrump this Tuesday. Was glad to welcome him to the #NC05. Only 54 days until #ElectionDay. Make sure you have a plan to vote. Don't have a plan yet? Go to https://t.co/CPnDdayAak for all the info you might need. #TeamFoxx https://t.co/fbalyV1AMM
Looking forward to welcoming President Trump to NC's 5th Congressional District this evening!  https://t.co/QUPE95Vdjj

Check out my new & improved website! https://t.co/rgcMi6mYxm just got a refresh for the final 64 days until #ElectionDay. You can use this website as your resource for information about the campaign how to vote & chip in to support our grassroots campaign. #TeamFoxx https://t.co/fSGb618Fda
Wonderful speech by my friend @GOPLeader @kevinomccarthy #RNC2020 https://t.co/EFFoa7yTtl
Tonight is night 2 of the @GOPconvention with speakers including @FLOTUS. Who are you looking forward to hearing from? #RNC2020 #TeamFoxx https://t.co/0kqaYLcUjP
.@GOPconvention is starting NOW! Are you watching? #RNCConvention2020 #MAGA #TeamFoxx https://t.co/oDiI145PiD
Congrats @Mike_Pence! I look forward to working with you for another 4 years to #KeepAmericaGreat! #RNC2020 https://t.co/0nnXGFm59D

100 years ago today the #19thAmendment was officially ratified giving women the right to vote. This year it is more important than ever that all of us exercise our right to vote. You can register to vote at https://t.co/XFa9k04YpZ #TeamFoxx https://t.co/1mkqnTjnUA
Happy Birthday to the hardest working member of Congress. Like to wish Congresswoman Foxx a Happy Birthday! -Team Foxx #ncpol #TeamFoxx https://t.co/5UccAEEWZJ
Happy Father's Day! Here's to all the great dads who love and sacrifice for their families every day! #FathersDay #ncpol https://t.co/AXKdRCUZRt
So proud of the hard work done this weekend. More work to be done until victory in November! https://t.co/zfMK8XmMUa
Sign up here to join Team #NCBoots 🥾 for Trump Victory’s National Weekend of Action. #LeadRight https://t.co/YFv0weKnPj https://t.co/jQoQo8si4d

This #MemorialDay we honor and remember every selfless patriot who gave all to protect our nation and preserve our freedoms. A grateful nation will not forget the profound price many have paid for our liberty. #ncpol https://t.co/yNq3E0O69a
Proud of the hard work the NC Trump Victory team has been doing! https://t.co/3gzO8lUjmS

Just 100 days until the Republican National Convention in Charlotte!  I'm thrilled that NC will be hosting this gathering to nominate President Trump for #4MoreYears.  #RNCinCLT https://t.co/5fqRJjzBr2

We are 100 Days from the Republican National Convention in Charlotte NC! I'm excited for the convention to showcase our conservative principles & the results President @realDonaldTrump has produced for the good of all Americans. #4MoreYears #RNCinCLT @GOPconvention @GOP @NCGOP https://t.co/cf7nlhv00J

What a victory for @MikeGarcia2020 last night in #CA25. It is past time for Christy Smith to concede this race and allow the people of #CA25 to have their duly elected member of Congress take his seat in the People’s House. https://t.co/g6BjY2ZrdW

I hope you will join me in prayer tomorrow during the National Day of Prayer. Let's especially lift up those who are suffering from COVID-19 and those who are heroically serving on the front lines of the battle against this pandemic. #NationalDayOfPrayer https://t.co/f87Yt57NIS
Thanks for your hard work Jack! #NCBoots #LeadRight https://t.co/yB50hkdZ87
Join Trump Victory’s National Weekend of Action! Sign up here to join Team #NCBoots 🥾 to help re-elect President Trump and keep North Carolina RED in November! #LeadRight ➡️ https://t.co/JCXmEmvVwP
He Is Risen!  Happy Easter! https://t.co/wC4PT9r7TM

How are you creating social distance today to help slow the spread of coronavirus?    It's important for everyone to do our small part by limiting our non-essential travel and personal contacts right now.  I hope you'll stay safe and be smart today.  #TogetherApart  #NCBoots

I am honored that the @SBAList  has acknowledged my dedication to fighting for the rights of the unborn and I am committed to staying in that fight --> https://t.co/DRHvewruLf  Join us here: https://t.co/d6xqUkKP7h https://t.co/By7pwaA73H
Honored to have the endorsement of @SBAList. I have and will continue to fight for #ProLife #ProWomen. #TeamFoxx #ncpol https://t.co/HaM6FnfpPX

Today is Primary Election day! Although I don't have a primary opponent & am not on the ballot until November its important to get out & vote for Republicans to Keep America Great!  You can find your polling location here --> https://t.co/FWN2JaOxIe  #TeamFoxx #ncpol #MAGA #NC05 https://t.co/7siZs9mrlK

Had a fun chat recently with Ellen Troxclair for her "Step Up" podcast. We talked about my journey from poverty to Congress and how I love to encourage others to get involved and make a difference. Check it out on Apple podcasts or Spotify! https://t.co/eZwAX17FPP

I voted early this week hope you did the same! Even though I don't have a primary opponent it's still critical to go vote for Republicans up and down the ballot. Click the link to find your voting location: https://t.co/IkvIPy7xdO #TeamFoxx #NC05 #ncpol https://t.co/O9vL57y3AS
